## Make some vectors

```{r}
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow")

#Check the class
class(marmots)
```

```{r}
pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.8, 8.5)

#Check the class
class(pika)

#Scalar multiplier

scalar_pika <- 5.2 * pika
scalar_pika
```

```{r}
bananas <- c(1, 2, 3)

apples <- c(6, 7, 8)

bananas + apples
bananas - apples
bananas %*% apples 

```
